title: 10 placement game wins in a row = Bronze 4?

replies.body:
10 wins after a reset where you were previously in bronze 3.

If you're good, you will climb anyway and provisionals mean nothing, challengers have more to complain about because the highest they can get is plat 1  from being number 1 on any server.

A- have you seriously not read the thousands of commentson the boards explaining this? Go read them..
B- you barely had any influence in those 10 games at all. You got carried into 10 wins. Even your miss fortune game you were carried by jayce

but seriously Bronze 4... wouldn't you be pissed?

edit. 

i'd probs be a higher level if i started at B5... whats the point.

well I was s2 last season win my promos 7-3 and placed into b2 now I am b1 like WTF RIOT .......? and guess what they dun give a fk but seriously from s2 to b2 I laugh so hard{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
